listitem.para: OPENAM-2479: com.sun.identity.agents.config.certdb.password should not be plain text
OPENAM-2318: In silent installation for the Varnish is visible password in CLI
OPENAM-1684: Varnish pipe mode needs an additional policy agent public method
OPENAM-1362: Support for Varnish caching proxy server
OPENAM-1270: Web policy agent/sdk needs an option to disable extended OpenAM naming URL validation during bootstrap
OPENAM-1258: Web policy agent including SDK needs better naming service handling mechanism
OPENAM-1257: Make naming URL validation net-connect timeout configurable
OPENAM-1256: Support IPv6 for notenforced.ip.handler = cidr
OPENAM-1195: Policy agent should support apache 2.4 webserver
OPENAM-1087: Policy Agent needs configurable option to enable/disable cache-control headers for unauthenticated sessions
OPENAM-980: Policy agent's post data preservation needs an option to work in URI based load balancer setups
OPENAM-936: Add configurable option to disable extra-302-redirect on (after) LARES post
OPENAM-915: Policy Agent needs configurable option to enable/disable url-encoding of session cookie sent with LARES response (CDSSO)
OPENAM-849: Policy Agent needs conditional redirect to a login URL based on incoming request URL
OPENAM-815: Ability to set Expires attribute on cookies
OPENAM-773: Support for OWA and SharePoint filters/auth modules
OPENAM-772: Use regular expressions (RegExp) in the configuration of non-enforced URL
OPENAM-770: Add a configuration option to be able to forward Agent injected attributes to non-protected URLs
